nodes.text: The LGN-19 MagnaPulse ion drive was a Podracer engine designed and produced by Farwan & Glott prior to the Invasion of Naboo.

The MagnaPulse was an ion drive designed by Farwan & Glott for use in starfighters and patrol boats. When the company entered into he Podracer market, they began marketing the MagnaPulse as a boutique engine attached to the FG 8T8-Twin Block2 Special.
